title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page
author: oeyoews
name: Tiddlywiki Static Page
text: {"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/readme","text":"* Tiddlywiki Static Page * [[Source|https://github.com/oeyoews/neotw/tree/main/dev/plugins/tiddlywiki-static-page]] * [[Demo|https://oeyoews.github.io/neotw/main]] "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/config":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/config"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/icon","text":" "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/macro/static-link":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/macro/static-link","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":"\define static-link() \end "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/ui/new-page":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/ui/new-page","tags":"$:/tags/ViewToolbar","description":"new-page","caption":"new-page","list-before":"$:/core/ui/Buttons/close","text":"\whitespace trim <$button message="new-page" tooltip="new-page" aria-label="new-page" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> encodeuricomponent[]] +[join[]] }}} target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"> {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/icon}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="new-page"/> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-link/ui/static-link":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-link/ui/static-link","tags":"$:/tags/ViewToolbar","list-before":"$:/core/ui/Buttons/close","description":"static-link","caption":"static-link","text":"\whitespace trim <$button message="tm-copy-to-clipboard" param={{{ [[$:/info/url/full]get[text]removesuffix[main.html]addsuffix[notes/]][[$:/info/url/full]get[text]removesuffix[main]addsuffix[notes/]] [[]addsuffixencodeuricomponent[]] +[join[]] }}} tooltip="copy static link" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/link}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> copy title "}}}
